page.title: 11An Ordinary Day (Cont.)
page.content:
brew for endless minutes....?).
The two older boys.Adrian,seven and Stuart eight ,wake next and we all eat a modest breakfast together of cereals,toast and fruit juice. Only on Sundays do we have the traditional breakfast of bacon ,eggs ,sauages ,mushrooms and tomatoes , and then we do not eat again until dinner in the evening.
After breakfast ,its a mad scramble while eveyone fights for a place at one of the two washbasins.(Once dress- ed and ready for school the boys begin their piano practice . They only practice for about 5 or 10 minutes each morning ,but it seems to be enough.They each have a 15 minute lesson after school on Tuesdays ,at
